welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Moskovskiy, Russia! Known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and soak up the beauty of Moskovskiy!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostafyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
Limited free access, premium options available for purchase

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's newest terminal, opened in 2012, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's oldest terminal, opened in 1964, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's largest terminal, opened in 2007, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must register with a valid phone number to access it.
